name: Homing Attack
description: Attack requires at least 1 cache die: Your next Precision attack bypasses cover. On hit, ignore all but 1 point of armor.
flavor: Targeting algorithms lock onto weak points.

name: Return Fire
description: When targeted by a ranged attack, you may use your current set of Precision to make a free attack against the attacker.
flavor: Your reflexes run on predictive code.

name: Momentum Spike
description: If you move at least 2 spaces on your turn, gain +1 to your next Agility or Physique action.
flavor: Movement is ammunition.

name: Echo
description: Project an illusory version of yourself. Once per scene, redirect any effect or check targeting you to the Echo.
flavor: Your timeline has spare versions of you to burn.

name: Scripted Deviation
description: The target of this Action's next Ingenuity Action takes a penalty equal to the Power of this Action.
flavor: Reality glitches when you rewrite its stage directions.

name: Overclocked Charm
description: When you succeed on a Charisma roll, you can select one target to gain +1 to their next Agility action.
flavor: A smile, but with firmware support.

name: Viral Spotlight
description: Mark a target entity. When entities perform any action directed towards that targetted entity, they may reroll one die from the register. This mark requires one die per turn after activation to maintain.
flavor: Attention is a weapon.

name: Obscura Kernel
description: Once per session while this Chip is still equipped, nullify any trace or signature check against you.
flavor: You were never here.

name: Nullface
description: Remove any mark, lock, or traces targeting you.
flavor: Identity is optional.

name: Breakpoint
description: Until the beginning of your next turn, the entity targetted by this ability cannot use lower width that one one this one used. After activating this skill, you cannot take any other actions until your next turn.
flavor: Even monsters crash.

name: Recompile
description: Once per scene, re-roll one Cyber die. Treat the action used with that die as +1.
flavor: Rewrite. Retry. Succeed.

name: Charm Loop Injection
description: Apply a ''Mesmerized'' condition: target cannot willingly attack you unless provoked.
flavor: Hypnotic code woven through tone and gesture.

name: Coolant
description: Once per turn, you can reduce incoming damage by 1. You are inflicted with the ''Frozen'' condition.
flavor: Advanced from the people who brought you forced reboots.

name: Slapdash Bootloader
description: You may reroll any die with a value of 1 on Wit rolls.
flavor: Optimized? No. Effective? Somehow.

name: Multi-Processing Unit
description: Provide a +1 bonus to all allies next Cyber roll within the scene.
flavor: Clean architecture breeds clean victories.

name: Vertex Quiet-Core
description: Your Stealth rolls are immune to external penalties for one scene.
flavor: Silent, elegant, inevitable.

name: Firmware Torrent
description: For two rounds, you may treat any single die as matching any existing set.
flavor: A backdoor to raw potential.

name: Woden Stress Cycler
description: When activated, your next attack does extra damage equal to the amount of direct harm done to your COMP since your last turn.
flavor: Pain is data. Data is useful.

name: Mechane Servo-Pulse
description: On melee hit, shove target 1–2 spaces and impose ''-1 Width'' on their next Body action.
flavor: Made with the same tech that bends steel beams.

name: Hardjack
description: Force-open any jammed or locked mechanical device with Body torque.
flavor: If it resists, twist harder.

name: Arc-Sigil
description: Your next Ingenuity roll also counts as Performance, and vice-versa.
flavor: Old gods repurposed for modern workflows.

name: Totem Ward
description: Place a Totem. Allies within 2 spaces gain +1 defense against Spirit effects.
flavor: Mysticism meets modular hardware.

name: Auto-Compliance
description: Automatically Apply ''Error-State'' to a civilian or bureaucratic target.
flavor: Ensure cooperation—legally or otherwise.

name: Crypt-Mold
description: Infect a digital target with slow corruption. Each round they take 1 system stress until they perform a Cyber check.
flavor: It spreads like rumor and clings like guilt.

name: Snapdart
description: Agility or Precision attack. On hit, apply ''Shocked'' if target''s Agility is lower.
flavor: A tiny trick with outsized payoff.

name: Ghostnote
description: On a successful Performance roll, reduce the target's Confidence by 1 for the scene.
flavor: A whisper is all it takes to wreck certainty.

name: Backdoor Mapper
description: Scan any system for structural weak points. Your next Cyber/Engineering roll automatically reveals bypass options.
flavor: Every system keeps a secret; you know where to ask.

name: Adaptive Footwork
description: When rolling Agility, you can choose to immediately move 1 space, not using your normal movement. Once per session ignore forced movement.
flavor: The world adjusts to your pace.

name: Static Lash
description: A basic electrical strike that doesn't deal damage but applies ''Shocked'', and also reduces the target's Cyber score by 1.
flavor: A jolt that rewrites priorities.

name: Ice Strike
description: On a melee attack, inflict ''Frozen'' condition. Target''s movement is halved next round.
flavor: Cold solves many problems.

name: Decay Drip
description: Until the target makes a Vitality check, their Physique is reduced by 1 at the end of every turn.
flavor: Life finds a way—into your bloodstream.

name: Glitchwave
description: You choose one die from the target's dice pool, they must reroll that die and keep the result.
flavor: Your existence stutters.

name: Sharp-set
description: If you attack an entity with a Precision action, the next Precision die you roll is Wild.
flavor: A subtle correction with massive payoff.

name: Overstep
description: When moving, you can always choose to ignore the first tile of hazardous terrain.
flavor: One clean leap solves a hundred problems.

name: Heat Sink
description: As a reaction, once per turn you can prevent either fire damage or the ''Burning'' condition.
flavor: Turn fire into a shrug.

name: Earthbind
description: Strike the ground, creating signals. All entities within 2 spaces reroll their die with the highest height in their pool.
flavor: The ground itself becomes your ally.

name: Watercoil
description: Form moisture into conduits. Until the next turn, all entities within 3 spaces of this Minor Action gain Water affinity until the start of your next turn.
flavor: Flow improves function.

name: Shroud
description: Project a shifting hologram. All attacks need to be one space closer to hit you until your next turn. Melee attacks still hit normally.
flavor: Distance is an illusion.

name: Voltage Anchor
description: Stabilize a circuit or device. Remove one electronic hazard or disable a trap''s trigger.
flavor: A grounding wire for chaos.

name: Pressure Point
description: Convert a melee hit into a nerve strike. Target loses 1 die from their next Body roll.
flavor: Anatomy meets interface.

name: Wormhole
description: As an Action, you are instantly teleported three spaces away from an enemy entity of your choice within line of sight.
flavor: Bend space to your will.

name: Neural Spike
description: On a successful Ingenuity attack, the target is stunned for one round and takes additional damage equal to your Ingenuity score.
flavor: A strike to the mind that echoes through the body.

name: Old Prayer
description: At the very end of the current turn, you may heal any debuffed stats across any entities in the scene equal to the strength of this Action.
flavor: Ancient words coded into modern miracles.

name: Data Leech
description: On a successful Cyber attack, steal one die from the target's curent dice pool, this cannot be added to the cache.
flavor: Feed on the knowledge of others.

name: Pulsewave Shield
description: As a reaction, create a shockwave that pushes all adjacent enemies 2 spaces away and grants you +2 defense until your next turn.
flavor: A fortress built from kinetic energy.

name: Heart of Iron
description: Add +1 to your Confidence Score as long as this chip is equipped.
flavor: Steadfast resolve in a volatile world.

name: Neuroflash
description: A ranged attack with a range of 4 spaces. If this attack deals damage with your lucky numbers, the target is stunned for the next round.
flavor: A sudden jolt that scrambles the senses.

name: Phase Shift
description: Minor Action: Become intangible, passing through 1 space of solid objects.
flavor: Slip between the cracks of reality.

name: Bioforge
description: Action: For the power of the Action, gain +2 to Physique actions. You cannot be healed from any status effects while this chip is active.
flavor: Biotech that turns flesh into steel.

name: Specter
description: Reaction: After taking damage from an attack, become invisible until the start of your next turn. This effect ends if you take an Action or Reaction.
flavor: A ghost in the machine, unseen and untouchable.

name: Warm Presence
description: When you target an entity with a Charisma Action, you may choose to remove one Fault Die, once per turn.
flavor: A gift woven from pure sweet streams.

name: Multi-Threading
description: As an action, you can increase a willing entities Action strength by 1
flavor: Bend time and code to your will.

name: Flesh Focus
description: As a minor reaction, become untargetable by Spirit attacks until the start of your next turn. Your next roll has +1 Error.
flavor: Your mind is a fortress against the ethereal.

name: Deadpan
description: You have +1 Defense against all Spirit abilities
flavor: Your expression is unreadable, even to machines.

name: Slick Circuitry
description: You may move one space as a Free Action on your turn, once per round.
flavor: Fluid movement through digital and Body spaces.

name: Opportunity Attack
description: Reaction: When an enemy leaves your melee range, make a free melee attack against them, using what Body die you currently have.
flavor: Seize the moment, strike with precision.

name: Rip and Tear
description: Whenever an attack has a Width of 3 or more, apply the ''Ruptured'' condition to the target.
flavor: Tear through defenses with brute force.

name: Jacked
description: Gain +1 to your Physique score while this chip is equipped.
flavor: Strength amplified through cybernetic enhancement.

name: Brain Shield
description: Gain +2 Defense against Ingenuity attacks.
flavor: A mental barrier against cognitive assaults.

name: Silent Step
description: Gain +1 to Stealth rolls while this chip is equipped.
flavor: Blend into the digital shadows.

name: Anti-Virus
description: Gain +1 Defense against Cyber attacks.
flavor: A cloak of digital obscurity.

name: Last Breath Protocol
description: While you are at 1 Vitality, if your first Vitality dice rolled on the turn is a 4 or higher, you may negate 2 Fault Dice that turn.
flavor: Swift code manipulation for rapid results.

name: Adrenaline Surge
description: You are immune to the effects of Fault Dice while using your Confidence score for actions.
flavor: A burst of raw energy when you need it most.

name: Synaptic Strike
description: Any Precision attack with 3 or more Power applies a level of Hit-Stun to the target entity.
flavor: A precise hit that disrupts neural function.

name: Cyberfocus
description: If you didn't roll any 6s on your last Cyber action, your next Cyber actions gains 2 Power.
flavor: Focus your digital mind for enhanced performance.

name: Kinetic Buffer
description: Gain +1 Defense to all Body attacks.
flavor: Absorb impact with reinforced cybernetics.

name: Burnweave Core
description: Any Burn effects that you inflicted add an extra Fault Die on its first turn.
flavor: Ignite your attacks with enhanced intensity.

name: Hex Spike
description: Minor Action: Add an extra stack of a status effect applied to an entity this turn.
flavor: Amplify your control over status effects.

name: Cortical Shard
description: If you target an Entity with a 2 Power or higher Wit action, apply 1 Hit-Stun to the target.
flavor: A sharp incantation that leaves a lasting impression.

name: Magnetron
description: Any Voltage attack with 3 or more Power applies the ''Stunned'' condition to the target entity.
flavor: Harness electromagnetic forces for devastating effects.

name: Noise Bomb
description: Reaction: Negate any Cyber attacks targeting you if the attack height is below 5
flavor: Disrupt digital targeting with a burst of static.

name: Frostbite
description: Any Ice attack with 3 or more Power applies the ''Frozen'' condition to the target entity.
flavor: Chill your enemies to the bone with enhanced cold.

name: Echo Chamber
description: When you perform 2 Actions or more on a Performance roll, all allies within 2 spaces gain +1 to their next turn's rolls.
flavor: Your voice resonates, empowering those around you.

name: Graviton Well
description: Minor Action: Pull all entities within 2 spaces towards you by 1 space.
flavor: Manipulate gravitational forces to control the battlefield.

name: Neural Net
description: Once per turn, you may treat one cache die as matching any existing set.
flavor: A web of interconnected thoughts and data.

name: Glitch Influence
description: Instead of dealing direct damage, lower the target entity's Confidence by 1 for each Power level of the attack
flavor: A subtle manipulation that undermines confidence.

name: Double Speak
description: If a Charisma attack hits, and the Power of the attack exceeds the target's Confidence, apply 1 Hit-Stun to the target.
flavor: Words that cut deeper than any blade.

name: Thermal Regulator
description: Gain +1 Defense against Fire and Ice attacks.
flavor: Maintain optimal temperature in extreme conditions.

name: Circuit Breaker
description: Reaction: When targeted by a Cyber attack, negate the attack if the attack height is below 3.
flavor: Disrupt digital assaults with a sudden jolt.

name: Panic in the Core
description: Any Power 3 or higher Ingenuity attack applies the ''Confused'' condition to the target entity.
flavor: Overwhelm your target's mind with chaotic code.

name: Flame Vision
description: Action: Inflict 1 Burn to any enemy within visible range. This effect is removed while no longer in line of sight.
flavor: See the world through a fiery lens.

name: Supreme Vigor
description: While this chip is equipped, you gain +1 Vitality
flavor: Endurance enhanced through cybernetic augmentation.

name: Night-Runner
description: If you remained hidden on your turn using Stealth, your next roll gets a +1
flavor: Master the art of moving unseen.

name: Assault Matrix
description: Applies Confused, reduce the target enity's Cyber score by 1 for the scene.
flavor: Disrupt the digital mind with calculated chaos.

name: Targetted Messaging
description: Reaction: If being targetted by an Action, you can force the entity targetting to reroll one die of their choice.
flavor: Some last minute hesitation caused from years of subtle messagings

name: Stand Strong
description: As an action, you enter into a reactive stance. Until the end of the next turn, whenever an enemy targets you, you may attack with a Minor Reaction, provided they are within range.
flavor: The power of the hunt is one of deep meditation and instinct. In a flow state, anything becomes possible.

name: Grit
description: If your Confidence score is reduced, you gain a +1 to a Body roll on the next turn.
flavor: The facades of the soldier must be consumed to serve the ultimate purpose.

name: Go Viral
description: While targetting an entity, you may  choose to discard one cache die. The target gains the Viral status. While targetting that entity with a Charisma ability while they have the Viral status the Power of that action increases by 1.
flavor: Sometimes you need to wait until people care, and then it will be the time to strike.

name: Lone Wolf
description: When no allies are within 10ft. add +1 die to Precision and Confidence rolls. You cannot gain the benefits of this ability if you were the target of a buff by a friendly creature since your last turn. Stack: increase the distance required by 10ft.

name: Overkill
description: If you defeat an enemy, on your next turn, treat all 9s and 10s as the same digit.

name: Mini Map
description: Allows for a special scanning action which takes an entire turn. The action generates a digital map of the immediate area, revealing all routes, obvious terrain threats and bonuses.

name: Follow-Through
description: Combo. After you successfully deal damage with a Physique-based attack, you may immediately make a second Physique attack against the same target using the same Width, provided you discard that number of die from your cache.
flavor: You don’t stop moving. The hit is just permission.

name: Chain Reaction
description: Combo. After you hit an entity with elemental damage, you may make a second attack against a different target within range at -1 the same width.
flavor: The magic echoes. Someone else pays for it.

name: Source Run
description: While you have a melee weapon actively equipped, you may add +1 to your Agility increasing the distance travelled.
flavor: An exploit has given you a great tactical advantage.

name: Hard Point
description: If you haven’t moved from where you were standing at the begining of the last turn, until; your next turn, add +1 to your Defense
flavor: An exploit has given you a great tactical advantage.

name: Quick Scope
description: Once per round, you can swap weapons as a free Action, and if you do you may attack as a reaction, if you discard one die from the cache. Stack effect: This Ability adds +1 Quick to your actions on the next turn.
flavor: One shot, one kill, one second.

name: Gamer Rage
description: When you are damaged directly by an enemy entity, you may roll one die and add it to the cache.
flavor: The scorn and vitriol powers resolution.

name: Combat Engineer
description: In a pinch you have learned to handle machines. You may use yyour Physique Stat to operate vehicles or machinery that would normally require Engineering. You may use any Engineering ability with a Precision roll, at the cost of 2 cache dice.
flavor: The scorn and vitriol powers resolution.

name: Imperfection
description: While targetting any entity with a reaction, you may choose to add the Hit-Stun quality to the effect.
flavor: Malfunctions are a common issue with electrical discharges.

name: Critical Hit
description: Anytime you deal damage with an attack using 0 as the digit, ignore Defense, and add +1 to the Stack of any secondary effects inflicted by that Action.
flavor: It's super-effective!

name: Gift of Life
description: You gain a Touch-Ranged Action (Heal), which uses Engineering. Targetting an entity restores lost Vitality up to its maximum. This ability takes a -1 penalty by default (a trip would Heal 1 Vitality).
flavor: Stranger things have happened in the universe.

name: Iron Fists
description: You have trained in Martial Arts, and your body is considered a Versatile Weapon which you can easily wield.
flavor: Just as you have done before, you crush all those who stand before you.

name: Unseen Eyes
description: If you have the hidden condition from the previous turn, and you can see all opposed entities within the space you are hidden, gain +1 Power to all stealth Actions, as well as your passive Stealth.
flavor: Never act until  you are certain it is the time to strike.

name: Analyze
description: As a special action that takes your entire turn, you can check for the weaknesses and stats of one entity. If you are Hidden, this can be done as a Minor Action instead.
flavor: There may be a million ways to get rid of you. Which one is the easiest?

name: Soft Reset
description: If you are 5ft. away from an entity and they use a Reaction with a Body stat, you may also React to negate their Action, providing the Power of yours meets or beats the original Action strength.
flavor: This was a calculated risk that has already been accounted for.

name: Sneak Attack
description: While you are considered Hidden, at the start of each round as a Reaction, you may make a Stealth Attack. This action can be used at any point in the round.
flavor: This was a calculated risk that has already been accounted for.

name: Ghost Protocol
description: When you are reduced to 0 Vitality, immediately roll two extra die. You are also considered Hidden until the beginning of the next round against opposing entities.
flavor: The mission sometimes becomes more important than life itself.

name: Meme Lord
description: If you have already made a Spirit Action this turn, any additional Spirit Actions gain the Nice quality.
flavor: Brain rot.

name: SignalBoosting
description: When you inflict any status to another entity, you may discard one die from your cache, and add a stack of that effect.
flavor: Use your ability to amplify your own powers.

name: Live Stream
description: As a Minor Charisma Action, you may allow another entity access to your sight.
flavor: The mission sometimes becomes more important than life itself.

name: Direct Injection
description: You may peform any Action that would normally only be possible within cosmOS in the living world, provided you use at least one Cache die as a part of that Action.
flavor: Awaken, for this world and its secrets have much more to show us.

name: Root Access
description: You can become the administrator of any non-magical computer you are able to log into. This takes an Action to perform but lasts until someone reverts the settings.
flavor: We found a back door to a lot of things.

name: Black Magic Arsenal
description: Any Ingenuity attack ignores one Stack of either Defense or Sturdy, your choice.
flavor: Behold the power!

name: Firewall
description: As a reaction using your cache, you can choose to negate a Cyber Action that targets you directly, provided it meets or beats the Power score.
flavor: Behold the power!

name: Greater Evasion
description: As a reaction using at least one of your cache die, you may instead negate the effect.
flavor: The mission sometimes becomes more important than life itself.

name: Cloak and Dagger
description: Whenever you perform a successful attack as a reaction, as a Minor Action you can follow-up with a Minor Action melee attack for +1 damage. Stack Effect: Damage increases for each level of Cloak and Dagger.
flavor: If it takes one million stabs in the back, so be it.

name: Disarm
description: If you perform an Acrobatics attack against an entity before their turn, apply Hit-Stun.
flavor: You're too slow (;

name: Digital Footprint
description: After each Acrobats Action, gain +1 Integrity until the start of the next round.
flavor: You can move too fast to be hacked.

name: Prop Hunt
description: As an action, you can create cover for yourself to hide better. This cover takes up an entire space, and can provide a Hidden bonus equal to the Power of the action. Stack: The maximum number of placeable Props increases.
flavor: With this we can blend right in.

description: As a minor action, you can provide the following bonus to yourself or an ally within 15 ft: All 6 and 7 digits can be matched as pairs.
flavor: With this we can blend right in.

name: Heart React
description: As a minor Performance reaction, you can touch any entity, and remove 1 of their Error die.
flavor: I really like what you did there.

name: Social Parasite
description: You you successfully target an entity with a Performance Action, you may choose to use a cache die for a Minor Action, you can apply any modifier they have to yourself.
flavor: Anything you can do, I can do better

name: Flame War
description: If you attack an entity more than once before your next turn, each successive attack applies +1 Burn to the target.
flavor: You are messing with the wrong person.

name: Acts of Healing
description: You gain the ability to recover lost strength. As a Performance action, you may choose to Heal any Spirit stats, back up to their maximum.
flavor: This gift should be used wisely.

name: Encouragement
description: When you Out-think, you can allow one ally within 15ft reroll one die of their choice.
flavor: This gift should be used wisely.

name: Elemental Attunement
description: As a minor action, you can choose to change the damage type of a weapon to either Ice, Electric or Dark. This lasts until the end of the scene.
flavor: With the forces of the elementals, you should fear the power.

name: Patchwork
description: As an action, using at least 1 Cache Die, you may Heal one Cyber to any willing entity within touch range.
flavor: With my hands you will continue to run.

name: Boot Camp
description: You may equip to two chips, which you normally would not qualify to equip.
flavor: The hardware is good, it should be able to run anything.

name: Voyager
description: You naturally extend your movement by 5ft.
flavor: The hardware is good, it should be able to run anything.

name: Volt Surge
description: You again a Special Minor Action. You can touch a willing entity, the next an another entity targets the willing target, they suffer the Shocked status effect immediately. This wears off at the start of your next turn.
flavor: The hardware is good, it should be able to run anything.

name: Rapid Fire
description: If you use cache die on any Precision attack, you can instead target all enemy entities within range, with -1 Power. Stack Effect: This ability gains +1 Piercing.
flavor: The hardware is good, it should be able to run anything.

name: Mulligan
description: As a reaction, At the cost of turning a regular cache die into a fault die, you can choose to reroll all dice in the register. You cannot activate this ability if you have done anything else earlier this round.
flavor: Sometimes, the best thing you need is a fresh start.

name: Stack Overflow
description: As a minor action, if any enemy entity has 3 or more status effects, you can choose one status and remove it. Inflict Cyber damage equal to its remaining duration.
flavor: Too much data makes it easy to break in.

name: Wormhole Shot
description: You can expend one cache die while using a Precision attack to move to a space beside the target.
flavor: Too much data makes it easy to break in.
